item.title: Hugo Cheatsheet
item.description: Hugo markdown format Section number default Section number is set to “true” add “section_number = false” to front matter if Dont Not want to add section_number in the content. +++ title = "Hugo Cheatsheet" date = 2019-08-18T10:30:29Z description = "" tags = ["hugo", "cheatsheet", "docker", "blog"] categories = ["tech"] section_number = false +++ Syntax Highlight {{< highlight go “linenos=table,hl_lines=8 15-17,linenostart=199” >}} // … code {{< /highlight >}} file format PygmentsCodeFences

item.title: Develop Hugo
item.description: Youtube Tutorial https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qtIqKaDlqXo&list=PLLAZ4kZ9dFpOnyRlyS-liKL5ReHDcj4G3 有特别帮助的网址 关于整体结构和简单的theme设置 https://www.zeolearn.com/magazine/develop-a-theme-for-hugo 中文网站 https://bwaycer.github.io/hugo_tutorial.hugo/overview/introduction/ 语法高亮的支持 Paginator用法 使用思维导图 Hexo 脑图 Insert javascript into hugo by partial Create custom Shortcodes
